meanings.definition: To divide or separate into parts
meanings.sent1: She was splitting the cake into slices for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The lumberjack was splitting the large log with his axe.
meanings.sent3: The magician was splitting the rabbit in half, but it magically came back together!
meanings.sent4: The earthquake was so powerful, it felt like the ground was splitting beneath our feet.
meanings.sent5: The chef's precise knife skills made splitting the vegetables look effortless.

meanings.sent4: The singer's powerful voice seemed to be splitting the air around us.
